Title: SuperCaptcha for MVC
HomeWiki:
Project Description

SuperCaptcha is a .net library with a captcha control in it. This is similar to Google's reCaptcha but does not have any public key, private key concept.

The current version of the library has the following features implemented in it

  • Refresh captcha
  • Listen captcha ( text-to-speech conversion)
  • Support for model binding
  • Configurable captcha length
  • Culture support (English and Spanish)
  • Validation support

Future versions will target on,

  • Configuring Css and Images.
  • Support for few more language cultures


Download and Usage instruction is given in Documentation section.
You can find a sample solution 'SuperCaptcha.TestClient' that uses this library in the download package.

Nuget Package is also available for SuperCaptcha.
